conbody.p: Select this menu item to use teacher's microphone as the media source.
The Teacher control tab ( ) has only the Start with two additional options: Record for students and Digitize. They are described in _fixme_ xref.
This allows the students to hear the teacher during any activity.
Immediately below the Start button there is a clock that displays time elapse since teacher microphone was selected as a source for broadcast.
conbody.note: You can digitize and save teacher's voice for future use.
